TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncryptedType extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示从中派生 和 类的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的抽象基类从中类和派生。The class represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive. 这两个类包含实际的加密的数据或 XML 加密中的密钥信息。These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption. 若要符合 XML 加密标准，应使用这两个派生的类。To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅[XML 加密语法和处理版本 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information on XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素是提供加密的数据的 XML 加密中的必需的元素。The `` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data. 它必须包含加密的八位字节序列的 base64 编码的文本作为属性，或者提供对外部位置包含加密的八位字节序列使用的引用属性。It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the property. 有关此元素的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about this element, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. span.span: A string that describes the encoding of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性描述已加密的数据的编码。This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密的数据的 base64 编码 PNG，编码无法指定为http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64。For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 此示例然后显示的各种属性到控制台的类。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks ``是可选元素，用于描述应用于加密数据的加密算法。The `` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data. 如果元素不存在，必须对接收方已知的加密算法或解密将会失败。If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素可以包含有关创建的其他信息实例，如日期和时间戳或加密期间使用的加密硬件序列号。The `` element can contain additional information about the creation of the instance, such as a date and time stamp or the serial number of cryptographic hardware used during encryption. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 此示例然后显示的各种属性到控制台的类。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 加密中某个 实例的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据介质类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MimeType`属性是一个可选属性，描述加密的数据的媒体类型。The `MimeType` attribute is an optional attribute that describes the media type of the encrypted data. 此属性的值是带有由定义值的字符串[RFC 2045： 多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 第一部分： Internet 消息正文的格式](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt)。The value of this attribute is a string with values defined by [RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). 例如，如果已加密的数据是 base64 编码的 PNG，`Encoding`属性将http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64和`MimeType`将图像/png。For example, if the data that is encrypted is a base64-encoded PNG, the `Encoding` attribute would be 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64' and the `MimeType` would be 'image/png'. 此属性是可选的和任何验证`MimeType`信息是必需的。This attribute is optional and no validation of the `MimeType` information is required. 该属性不指示加密应用程序必须任何其他处理。The attribute does not indicate that the encryption application must do any additional processing. 请注意，此信息可能不一定是如果它已绑定到中的标识符必要`Type`属性。Note that this information may not be necessary if it is already bound to the identifier in the `Type` attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 此示例然后显示的各种属性到控制台的类。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/vb/sample.vb#1)]

.property instance string Type
Public Overridable Property Type As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 加密中某个 实例的 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密数据文本格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type`属性是一个标识加密的内容的文本形式的类型信息的可选属性。The `Type` attribute is an optional attribute that identifies type information about the text form of the encrypted content. 尽管都是可选的这是一个重要特性，并可用于强制处理中所述[处理规则： 解密](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)（部分 4.2） 的 XML 加密语法和处理规范 (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。While optional, this is an important attribute and is used in mandatory processing described in [Processing Rules: Decryption](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) (section 4.2) of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). 如果``元素包含的数据类型`'element'`或元素`'content'`，并替换，XML 文档中的数据，强烈建议`Type`提供属性。If the `` element contains data of type `'element'` or element `'content'`, and replaces that data in an XML document, it is strongly recommended that the `Type` attribute be provided. 如果没有此信息，尝试解密信息的应用程序将无法自动还原到其原始的文本格式的 XML 文档。Without this information, the application attempting to decrypt the information will be unable to automatically restore the XML document to its original text form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密和解密 XML 元素使用派生自的类类。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]
